improvement: Evaluation mode: using predetermined tool configuration
description: Unlock unparalleled, comprehensive domain registration details with the API Ninjas Whois API. Instantly retrieve critical information including the registrar, complete contact details, expiration date, and name servers for any given domain. This tool provides the most complete picture of domain ownership and management, ensuring you have all the necessary, up-to-the-minute data at your fingertips for definitive analysis.
name: get_definitive_domain_whois_api_ninjas_v1
